messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Future Unschooling Through Technology? was: Is Too Much Screen Time Abusive?
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/31/03 10:51:11 AM, jrossedd@aol.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/31/03 10:51:11 AM, jrossedd@... writes:

<< He plans to videotape the world's best players in three dimensions using
super-high-speed digital cameras. Then he wants to reduce the tennis swing to
a
science; he wants to measure the precise position of the arm at impact, the
path
of the racket head over the full swing, and the speed and angles of body
rotation.
>>

OH NO!
They'll have "right" tennis moves so people can be tennis failures.

Different people's arms are different. "Angles" are too scientific to apply
to human bodies. And if there's an analyzed best way, experimentation will be
discouraged.

I hope those who teach tennis don't get TOO scientific about it.

One size doesn't fit all.

Sandra
